segments.text: I'm looking at this kitchen, and the woman's focused on her dish drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink behind her is full, water trickling over the rim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Suddenly, I realize it's overflowing badly onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's stepped into the puddle without a clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, a boy's on a stool reaching the cookie jar high up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Whoa, the stool's leaning back dangerously far.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's pulling out cookies, plate in the other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's right there, arm up, eyes on the prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're sneaking it all while mom's distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a serene garden, totally opposite the indoor frenzy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect the kids to be so bold on that shaky perch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's spreading; someone could slip easily now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole setup is precarious, ready to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The tied-back curtains let in light on this sneaky scene.
segments.speaker: PAR
